rows.label: qst104906_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh, beauteous gentleman! Your beads
of sweat trickle like liquid diamond
upon your pristine skin!

rows.label: qst104906_msg0002
rows.name:
...My apologies. I can get a bit carried
away.

rows.label: qst104906_msg0003
rows.name:
Now do tell me all about your
encounter with the Jairo Griffox!

rows.label: qst104906_msg0022
rows.name: We beat the enemy with deadly force.

rows.label: qst104906_msg0023
rows.name: Flames of friendship led us to victory.

rows.label: qst104906_msg0041
rows.name:
A heated battle!
That would be the gist of it, yes?

rows.label: qst104906_msg0051
rows.name:
Yes, yes, I see! Tell me more!
And then...? ...Ah! What enchanting
flames they must have been!

rows.label: qst104906_msg0061
rows.name:
I've got it. Thank you so much
for all that.

rows.label: qst104906_msg0063
rows.name:
I'd like you to pick up the
Storied Band that I dropped
from atop the Amphoret Pillar.

rows.label: qst104906_msg0064
rows.name:
Oh, pay no heed to the "storied"
part. It's just a worthless trinket
I was using as a prop, really...

rows.label: qst104906_msg0065
rows.name:
What I want to capture is the vignette
that tells of your glorious success!

rows.label: qst104906_msg0066
rows.name:
Tell me in detail just how you treat
the ring as you treasure it in those
precious hands!

rows.label: qst104906_msg0101
rows.name:
Ah, my knights in shining armor have
returned... How I long to hear of their
exploits from their own wondrous lips!

rows.label: qst104906_msg0201
rows.name:
Ah, my dashing gentleman...
Please try to recall every detail as you
take the ring in your perfect fingers!

rows.label: qst104906_msg0202
rows.name:
I'll need you to relate the scene vividly
so I can use your story as inspiration!

rows.label: qst104906_msg0301
rows.name:
Ideally, I'd like one of your
male contingent to fetch the
Storied Band for me...

rows.label: qst104906_msg0302
rows.name:
You can have someone else pick up
the ring if you must, but I insist that a
dashing gentleman recount the tale...
